Highlighted Project: Game Inspired Posters

Project Accelero

A game built around a generative track feature, which makes each race a new experience. Upgrades and difficulty scaling increase replayability. Built in the Godot game engine.

SVRD60 Keyboard Platform

A modular keyboard built from scratch. Designed to be an easily extendable platform with hotswap capabilities.
